attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the streets are filled with more and more violence, and the public are never able to gain any real satisfaction from corporations, I suggest that we re-introduce the noble art of duelling.

Under strict supervision and guidance two parties who agree to take part as there is no other form of satisfaction available can pay a small fee and attend an organized duel.  Weapons to be provided by the state.

This will enable the public to settle scores, gangland groups to keep violence away from the public at large and raise revenue through taking part, sponsorship and tv rights.

The ensure a fair match, the weapons whould be chosen by the state as something neither party has used previously.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
